review.title: “A cutting edge industrial automation company with plenty of opportunity for those who seek a challenge.”
review.pros: Pros – 1. Multi-disciplined: Process Automation, Machine Process Automation, Business Intelligence, IT, Regulated Industries, Engineering and Design2. Multiple clients: Consumer Products, Manufacturing, Life Sciences, Food & Beverage, SI to Large EPCs3. Cutting edge technical development4. Work with excellent technical resources5. Opportunities to cross over into other technologies6. Flexible work schedule7. Management truly appreciates the company employees
review.cons: Cons – 1. The company has a family feel. Its a challenge to hold that feeling as the company grows.2. The office is becoming crowded and space is becoming an issue. Your workspace is functional.3. Huddle rooms are needed
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – 1. Continue to press on with the new organization model and growth model.2. Maintain the communications / keep the employees informed3. Consider moving to a larger office facility

review.title: “Treated as contractor but paid as employee with few benefits”
review.pros: Pros – Some interesting technologies, Could be a great company, lots of potential with product and smart young staff. need a few more grey hairs. Good clients but not many of them - very risky
review.cons: Cons – Out of site - out of mind. Little management Infrastructure to support employees particularly those offsite. Probably a great 30 person company. A poor place to work with 100 employees. Two owners often do not appear aligned.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Delegate & Listen - Build structure, Led Leaders lead. Owners Own. Decide to be 120 person company making 15% Margin or 30 person company making 40% margin. Talk to employees and take heed of what they say even if they earn less or are younger than you.
